com.here.mobility.sdk.core

Class HereMobilitySdk

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.core.HereMobilitySdk

  • public class HereMobilitySdk
extends Object
    The entry class for Here's Mobility SDK.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(Application app)
        Call this method from your app's Application.onCreate() method to initialize the SDK.

      • isHereAgentProcess

        public static boolean isHereAgentProcess(Context context)
        Returns whether the current process is the SDK agent process.

      • getVersionName

        public static String getVersionName()
        Returns the SDK version name.
        Returns:
        sdk version name

      • getLoggingId

        public static String getLoggingId()
        Returns a logging id. This id can be used to query Here Mobility SDK logs.
        Returns:
        logging id

      • setUserAuthInfo

        public static void setUserAuthInfo(HereSdkUserAuthInfo hereSdkUserAuthInfo)
        Sets the current user of the SDK. The SDK will persist the value for future uses, so need to call this method only once per HereSdkUserAuthInfo, and renew it when the HereSdkUserAuthInfo is expired, or when the user is switched.
        Parameters:
        hereSdkUserAuthInfo - The current user of the application. Pass null to log-out the current user

      • getUserAuthInfo

        public static HereSdkUserAuthInfo getUserAuthInfo()
        Returns the user information; null when not supplied by the app.

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        Checks if the MobilitySdk was initialized
        Returns:
        true if the MobilitySdk was initialized
